title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Health Promotion Strategy Workshop Based on Situated Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design health-promoting behavior plans with over 80% accuracy in real-life contexts
Learners can analyze situational health risk factors and propose three or more practical solution strategies
Learners can draft behavior change contracts incorporating peer feedback and report execution results after one week
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
